response.overview: Frankie and his European wife are lounging on pool chairs and poring over a copy of Bizarre Contacts magazine when they encounter an ad for an "Ultimate Transformation" service that turns men into women. Nagging Euro Wife thinks this is a glorious idea; Frankie not so much. "I'm a man," Frankie insists. "That's what YOU think," his wife replies, clearly annoyed at her "macho" husband who thinks he's above this sort of thing.  Anyhow, Nagging Euro Wife rapidly manages to goad her hubby into proving his manhood by taking a road trip to see the feminizing experts at the Jordan-West Agency. If that doesn't make sense to you, then you need to turn back right now because that's just the first example of the esoteric logic that animates, with increasingly surreal effect, this goofy BDSM effort from the masters of perversion at Jennifer Jordan Productions.
response.title: Tied, Trained and Transformed
